main event: Multiple observers reported sightings of unidentified flying objects in Jackson, Ohio, in May and June 1966.
interesting points: The objects were described as silvery white and cigar-shaped, hovering at low altitudes., One account noted an object moving silently and under intelligent control., Observers reported seeing lights and a distinct shape that resembled a balloon., The sightings occurred over multiple nights, with varying descriptions and durations., There was no photographic evidence provided in the reports.
